examples: The incident cast doubt on her motives and reliability.
El incidente arrojó dudas sobre sus motivos y confiabilidad.
The reliability of these results has been questioned.
Se ha cuestionado la fiabilidad de estos resultados.
Lawyers sought to cast doubt on the reliability of her statements.
Los abogados buscaron poner en duda la confiabilidad de sus declaraciones.
The aircraft has an exceptional record of reliability.
La aeronave tiene un historial excepcional de fiabilidad.
